instruction: any good zombie movies with action and horror?
output: If you’re up for a wild ride full of zombies and non-stop action, you’ve got to check out Dawn of the Dead! 🧟‍♂️🔫 It’s got that classic survival vibe with some serious gore and tense moments, all set in a shopping mall. Perfect for a spooky movie night!

instruction: looking for a creepy zombie movie where people hide in a mall
output: You’ll love Dawn of the Dead for that exact vibe! 😱 It’s a crazy horror flick where survivors barricade themselves inside a mall to fend off hordes of zombies. Packed with scares, some dark humor, and intense action — totally worth watching!

instruction: recommend a zombie apocalypse movie with lots of action
output: Dawn of the Dead is an awesome pick if you want zombie chaos with plenty of action! 💥🧟‍♀️ The story follows a group trapped in a mall, fighting off the undead in style. It’s got all the gore and thrills to keep you hooked till the end!
